Welcome to Update the Stream’s documentation

Update the Stream (UDTS) is an app that lets you easily manage esports scores, matches, and tournaments on your livestream. It can also pull information from external sources like Challonge to automatically update your in-stream UI.

Downloads

Get the latest releases here

How to contribute

Read our contributing guidelines and join the UDTS development Discord to start collaborating. We’re happy to help you figure out where your skills fit in the UDTS project!

Note

This project is under active development. Follow @updatethestream on Twitter for the latest information.
